Texts.Eng: Don't forget to upgrade this station whenever you have the resources to do so. It is absolutely worth the effort.

With an ^orange;Armorworks^reset; you can start really delving into combat. As you upgrade this station, you'll gain access to a ^green;huge variety of weapons and armors^reset;. You'll even uncover alien weapons from other realities! Try building an ^orange;Armorworks^reset; now.
